testsuite.name: com.neomovies.playersparser.PlayersParserTest
testsuite.system-out:
=== Testing VideoHUB Voice Studios === Series: Breaking Bad (tt0903747) Season 1, Episode 1
✗ VideoHUB: FAILED Ошибка: Failed to parse JSON response: A JSONObject text must begin with '{' at 0 [character 1 line 1]. Response: ========================================
=== Testing Movie Parsing === Movie: Inception (2010) IMDB ID: tt1375666
Testing rezka... ✗ rezka: FAILED Ошибка: Parse error: A JSONObject text must begin with '{' at 1 [character 2 line 1]. Response: deny host Детали: URL и плейлист отсутствуют ========================================
Testing collaps... ✗ collaps: FAILED Ошибка: No valid stream found in embed content. Content length: 0, Contains 'hls': false, Contains 'dash': false Детали: URL и плейлист отсутствуют ========================================
Testing videohub... ✗ videohub: FAILED Ошибка: Failed to fetch data from VideoHUB. URL: https://cors.apn.monster/https://plapi.cdnvideohub.com/api/v1/player/sv/playlist?pub=12&aggr=kp&id=tt1375666 Детали: URL и плейлист отсутствуют ========================================
=== Testing Series Info === Series: Breaking Bad (tt0903747)
Getting series info from rezka... ✗ rezka: Информация о сериале недоступна
Getting series info from collaps... ✗ collaps: Информация о сериале недоступна
Getting series info from videohub... ✗ videohub: Информация о сериале недоступна
=== Testing Fallback Strategy === Movie: Inception (tt1375666) Sources: rezka -> collaps -> videohub
✓ SUCCESS: Получен плеер из одного из источников ======================================== Плейлист: пуст или не предоставлен ========================================
=== Testing Collaps DASH Mode === Movie: Inception (tt1375666)
✗ Collaps DASH: FAILED Ошибка: No valid stream found in embed content. Content length: 0, Contains 'hls': false, Contains 'dash': false ========================================
=== Available Parsers ===
Registered parsers: 4 - rezka - collaps - collaps_dash - videohub
=== Testing Search === Query: Inception
Searching in rezka... ✗ rezka: Результаты не найдены
Searching in collaps... ✓ collaps: Найдено результатов: 2 ======================================== [1] Название: Начало: Работа на Кобол Год: 2010 Тип: film ID: 49794 Постер: https://img.imgilall.me/movies/franchise/4/9/7/9/4/0/0/0/0/0/610x900_49794.jpg
[2] Название: Начало Год: 2010 Тип: film ID: 168 Постер: https://img.imgilall.me/movies/franchise/1/6/8/0/0/0/0/0/0/0/610x900_168.jpg
========================================
Searching in videohub... ✗ videohub: Результаты не найдены Ошибка: A JSONObject text must begin with '{' at 0 [character 1 line 1]
=== Testing Series Parsing === Series: Breaking Bad IMDB ID: tt0903747
Testing rezka for S1E1... ✗ rezka: FAILED Ошибка: Parse error: A JSONObject text must begin with '{' at 1 [character 2 line 1]. Response: deny host ========================================
Testing collaps for S1E1... ✗ collaps: FAILED Ошибка: No valid stream found in embed content. Content length: 0, Contains 'hls': false, Contains 'dash': false ========================================
